jokes: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything.
Why did the chicken go to the seance? To talk to the other side.
Why don't some animals play cards? Because they're afraid of cheetahs.
quotes: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs
Believe you can and you're halfway there. - Theodore Roosevelt
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going. - Sam Levenson
compliments: You're a gift to those around you.
stoic_quotes: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be one. - Marcus Aurelius
The best revenge is not to be like your enemy. - Marcus Aurelius
It is not events that disturb people, it is their judgements concerning them. - Epictetus
He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive. - Seneca
It's not because things are difficult that we dare not venture. It's because we dare not venture that they are difficult. - Seneca
facts: Did you know? The shortest war in history was between Britain and Zanzibar on August 27, 1896. Zanzibar surrendered after 38 minutes.
Did you know? A single cloud can weight more than 1 million pounds.
Did you know? A human will eat on average 70 assorted insects and 10 spiders while sleeping.
Did you know? James Buchanan, the 15th U.S. president continuously bought slaves with his own money in order to free them.
